Type.Name: IDeserializationCallback

TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDeserializationCallback

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the <link location="node:gtk-sharp/programming/threads">Gtk# Thread Programming</link> for details.

summary.para: Indicates that a class is to be notified when deserialization of the entire object graph has been completed. Note that this interface is not called when deserializing with the XmlSerializer (System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSerializer).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDeserialization(object sender) cil managed

summary.para: Runs when the entire object graph has been deserialized.

Docs.param: The object that initiated the callback. The functionality for this parameter is not currently implemented.
